dashboard.summary: Here's the summary of your account
dashboard.summary_plural: Here's the summary of your {{count}} accounts

currentAddress.title: Current address
currentAddress.messageIfUnverified: Please verify that the Bitcoin address shown on your device matches the one on your computer
currentAddress.messageIfAccepted: Address confirmed, please re-verify it if you copy/paste or scan the QR code.
currentAddress.messageIfSkipped: Your {{currencyName}} address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify it for optimal security.

deviceConnect.step2: Navigate to the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app on your device

sidebar.text: Press this button to add accounts to the Portfolio

dashboard.title: Install apps or add accounts
dashboard.desc: Open the Manager to install apps or add accounts if your Ledger device already has apps installed

exchange.title: Trade
exchange.desc: Try a few services we've selected
exchange.coinhouse: Coinhouse is a trusted platform for individuals and institutional investors looking to analyze, acquire, sell and securely store crypto assets.
exchange.changelly: Changelly is a popular instant crypto asset exchange with 100+ coins and tokens listed.
exchange.coinmama: Coinmama is a financial service that makes it fast, safe and fun to buy digital assets, anywhere in the world.
exchange.simplex: Simplex is a EU licensed financial institution, providing a fraudless credit card payment solution.
exchange.paybis: it is safe and easy to Buy Bitcoin with credit card from PayBis. Service operates inÂ US, Canada, Germany, Russia and Saudi Arabia.
exchange.luno: Luno makes it safe and easy to buy, store and learn about cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum
exchange.shapeshift: ShapeShift is an online marketplace where users can buy and sell digital assets. It is a fast and secure way for the world to buy and sell digital assets, with no lengthy signup process, no counterparty risk, and no friction.
exchange.genesis: Genesis is an institutional trading firm offering liquidity and borrow for digital currencies, including bitcoin, bitcoin cash, ethereum, ethereum classic, litecoin, and XRP.
exchange.kyberSwap: Fast, simple and secure token swap platform. Powered by Kyber Network's on-chain liquidity protocol.
exchange.thorSwap: ThorSwap is an instant, safe and fair crypto asset market powered by decentralized atomic swap technologies. It is the most convenient way to start trading, no registration or KYC for small amount transactions.
exchange.changeNow: ChangeNOW is one of the leading custody-free instant exchange services

addAccounts.title: Add accounts

connectDevice.desc: Follow the steps below to add <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> accounts

addAccounts.successDescription: Add more accounts or return to Portfolio
addAccounts.successDescription_plural: Add more accounts or return to Portfolio

createNewAccount.title: Add new account
createNewAccount.noOperationOnLastAccount: Can't add a new account before you've received on your <1><0>{{accountName}}</0></1> account
createNewAccount.noAccountToCreate: No <1><0>{{currencyName}}</0></1> account was found to create

apps.installSuccess: {{app}} is now installed on your device
apps.uninstallSuccess: {{app}} has been uninstalled from your device
apps.help: Check on your device to see which apps are already installed

firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1><0>firmware version {{version}}</0></1>
firmware.disclaimerAppDelete: Apps installed on your device have to be re-installed after the update.
firmware.disclaimerAppReinstall: This does not affect your crypto assets in the blockchain.

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Press the right button to confirm.
modal.mcuFirst: Disconnect the USB cable from your device
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the processing screen appears
modal.mcuPin: If asked on device, please enter your pin code to finish the process
modal.successText: You may re-install the apps on your device

manager.title: Manager
manager.subtitle: Install or uninstall apps on your device

device.title: Connect your device
device.desc: Follow the steps below to open the Manager

confirmAddress.title: Verification
confirmAddress.text: Please verify that the {{currencyName}} address shown on your device matches the one on your computer

verification.title: Verification
verification.warning: Please verify all transaction details on your device
verification.body: Confirm the transaction on your device to send it

success.title: Transaction sent
success.text: Your account balance will update once the blockchain has confirmed the transaction

export.desc: Import accounts on your Ledger Live Mobile app

modal.title: Scan to export to mobile
modal.listTitle: To import accounts on your Ledger Live Mobile app:

display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.counterValueDesc: Choose the currency shown next to your balance and operations.
display.exchangeDesc: Provides the exchange rate from Bitcoin to {{fiat}}, used to estimate the value of your crypto assets (crypto asset â BTC â {{fiat}}).
display.regionDesc: Choose your region, used to set Ledger Live's time zone.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display an increase in market value in blue or Eastern to display it in red.

currencies.desc: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.exchangeDesc: Choose the provider of the exchange rate from {{currencyName}} to Bitcoin, used to estimate the value of your crypto assets ({{currencyName}} â BTC â {{fiat}}).
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: Set the number of network confirmations for a transaction to be marked as confirmed.

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: Optional, how long should the app be idle before it locks itself.
profile.softResetDesc: Clear the Ledger Live cache to force resynchronization with the blockchain.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings.
profile.developerModeDesc: Show developer and testnet apps in the Manager.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions (send, receive, lock, etc.), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and version of apps, app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, Ledger device type and firmware.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Set up as new or restore a Ledger device. Accounts and settings are kept.

about.desc: App information, Terms and Conditions, and Privacy Policy.

help.desc: Learn more about Ledger Live or get help.
help.faqDesc: A problem? Get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.termsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our Terms of Use.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use it.

hardResetModal.title: Reset Ledger Live
hardResetModal.desc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction history and settings? The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

softResetModal.title: Clear cache
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys providing access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: User action required
resetFallbackModal.part1: Could not delete cache folder. Please delete the folder manually:
resetFallbackModal.part2: Click the Open folder button, the
resetFallbackModal.part5: Then you can restart the app normally.

removeAccountModal.title: Remove account
removeAccountModal.desc: This will not affect your crypto assets. Accounts can always be re-added.

openUserDataDirectory.title: View user data
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data that is stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

exportLogs.title: Export logs
exportLogs.desc: Exporting Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.

setPassword.title: Password lock
setPassword.subTitle: Set a password
setPassword.desc: Make sure to remember your password. Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.

disablePassword.title: Disable password lock
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live data will be stored unencrypted on your computer. This includes account names, transactions and public addresses.

crash.uselessText: You may try again by restarting Ledger Live. Please export your logs and contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

disclaimerModal.title: Trade safely
disclaimerModal.desc_1: Before sending and receiving crypto assets, educate yourself to make informed decisions. Crypto assets are volatile and the prices can go up and down. Carefully evaluate your trading goals and the financial risk you are willing to take.
disclaimerModal.desc_2: Please beware that Ledger does not provide financial, tax, or legal advice. You should take such decisions on your own or consult with reliable experts.

init.title: Get started with your Ledger device

disclaimer.note1: Always choose your own PIN code.
disclaimer.note3: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase.

nano.step1: Connect the Ledger Nano S to your computer. Press both buttons to begin.
nano.step2: Press the right button to select <1><0>Configure as new device?.</0></1>
nano.step3: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step4: Select â to confirm your PIN code. Select â¬ to erase a digit.

blue.step1: Connect the Ledger Blue to your computer.
blue.step3: Choose a PIN code of 4 to 8 digits.

nano.step1: Connect the Ledger Nano S to your computer. Press both buttons to begin.
nano.step2: Press the left button to cancel <1><0>Initialize as new device?</0></1>. Then press the right button to select <3><0>Restore configuration?</0></3>.
nano.step3: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step4: Select â to confirm your PIN code. Select â¬ to erase a digit.

blue.step1: Connect the Ledger Blue to your computer.
blue.step3: Choose a PIN code of 4 to 8 digits.

initialize.title: Save your recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your device will display a 24-word recovery phrase to back up your private keys

nano.step1: Write <1><0>Word #1</0></1> in position 1 on a blank Recovery sheet.
nano.step2: Press the right button to continue and write down all 24 words.
nano.step3: Confirm your recovery phrase: select and validate each word by pressing both buttons.

blue.step1: Write down each word on a blank Recovery sheet while keeping the order.
blue.step2: Tap <1><0>Next</0></1> and write down all words until the <3><0>Confirmation</0></3> screen appears.
blue.step3: Enter each word to confirm your recovery phrase.

restore.title: Enter your recovery phrase
restore.desc: Enter the recovery phrase saved on your Recovery sheet

nano.step1: Choose the length of your recovery phrase.
nano.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><0>Word #1</0></1> until suggested words appear.
nano.step3: Choose <1><0>Word #1</0></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons.
nano.step4: Repeat the process until the last word.

blue.step1: Select the length of your recovery phrase.
blue.step2: Type the first word of your recovery phrase. Tap the word when it appears.
blue.step3: Repeat the process until the last word.

disclaimer.note1: Carefully secure your 24-word recovery phrase out of sight.
disclaimer.note2: Make sure you are the sole holder of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Ledger does not keep any backup of your recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note4: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase.

genuineCheck.title: Security checklist
genuineCheck.descGeneric: Before continuing, please complete the security checklist

step1.title: Did you choose your PIN code by yourself?

step2.title: Did you save your recovery phrase by yourself?

title.pinFailed: Didn't choose your own PIN code?
title.recoveryPhraseFailed: Didn't save your recovery phrase by yourself?
title.isGenuineFail: Oops, your device does not seem genuine...

desc.pinFailed: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code. Please contact us when in doubt.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: Only save a recovery phrase that was displayed on your device and to you alone. Please contact us when in doubt.
desc.isGenuineFail: Your device did not pass the authenticity test required to connect to Ledgerâs secure server. Please contact Ledger Support to get assistance.

setPassword.title: Password lock (optional)
setPassword.desc: Set a password to prevent unauthorized access to Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, transactions and public addresses

disclaimer.note1: Make sure to remember your password. Do not share it.
disclaimer.note2: Losing your password requires resetting Ledger Live and re-adding accounts.
disclaimer.note3: Resetting Ledger Live does not affect your crypto assets.

analytics.title: Bugs and analytics
analytics.desc: Share anonymized data to help improve Ledger security products and services.

shareAnalytics.title: Analytics
shareAnalytics.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger understand how to improve user experience.

mandatoryContextual.item7: Number of accounts, crypto assets and operations

sentryLogs.title: Bug reports
sentryLogs.desc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger fix bugs.

technicalData.title: Technical data*
technicalData.desc: Ledger will automatically collect fully anonymized technical data to help improve user experience.

mandatoryContextual.title: Technical data
mandatoryContextual.item2: Ledger Live version, language and region

terms.title: Terms *
terms.desc: By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to the <1>Terms of Use</1> and <3>Privacy Policy</3>.

finish.title: Your device is ready!
finish.desc: Install some apps on your device and access the Portfolio
